titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. c. 16

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2660.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact oriental@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: תוספתא
msItem.note: מעשר שני iii. 17 (לצפונו) to iv. 11 (נוטל).

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Mishnah אבות
msItem.note: vi. 6 (לעצמו אהב) to 10 (קונה שמים).

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud: ברכות
msItem.note: from fol. 45b, l. 9 (תסתיים דרב) to fol. 46a, l. 2 from below (מברכת הפירות).

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 5) from fol. 22, l. 4 from below (כל דבר שאין) to fol. 22b, l.16 from below (דברים להקל)

physDesc.p: Syr. Rabb. char.; 4to, vellum, injured and obliterated.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 7) from fol. 73, l. 11 (ואם איתה ניתני) to fol. 74, l. 20 (תנא ר̇ עקיבא)
(fol. 8) from fol. 79b, l. 7 from below (תמתין עד) to fol. 80b, l. 6 (הוא באשה)

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Commentary on Babylonian Talmud בבא מציעא, fol. 83
msItem.note: beg. חביתא דחמרא בריסתקא דמדוזא, ending אזל שבו שמטות מיניה.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; fol., vellum, much injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 10) from אפסי ארץ (ed. Venice, fol. 6a, l. 11) to לפני תיבה ביום (ibid. fol. 6b, l. 30)
(fol. 11) beg. ברוך ... על המחיה (ed. Ven. fol. 7a and Hild. fol. 54, but different from both), ending וכמבושל שלא נימא דב̇ רב̇י.

physDesc.p: Syr. Rabb. char.; fol., paper, obliterated.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: שאלתות of R. Aḥai
msItem.note: from ומה דברים (ed. Venice, col. 11, l. 10 from below) to בזקנותו שנאמר (ed. col. 13, l. 31).

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; fol., vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: A fragment of ה̇ חליצה
msItem.note: fol. 14 is headed שיטת חליצה, beg. מלמד לאישה ג̇ פסוקין ... לענות אותם אחר הדינים; the end of fol. 14b is headed שיטת מיאון, beg. injured.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; 4to, vellum, very much obliterated.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 14 bis) from תא שמע (fol. 26, l. 5 from below) to היה קרב והולך (fol. 26b, l. 17 from below)
(fol. 15) from לא תלתה (fol. 30, l. 13) to תל (fol. 30, l. 16 from below)

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Alfasi on בבא בתרא
msItem.note: i. 4 from ר̇ פפא רמא to שלצדקה נגבית בשנים.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Rashi's commentary on יבמות
msItem.note: from רשות ישראל (fol. 56b, l. 4 from below) to ובימי רבן יוח̇ בן זכאי (fol. 59b, l. 13 from below).

physDesc.p: Germ. Rabb. char.; fol., vellum, much injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Maimonides' משנה תורה
msItem.note: v. 1 (הראוי) to 5 (ההולכים) of ה̇ דעות.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Maimonides' משנה תורה
msItem.note: viii. 9 (מואב) to ix. 11 (הספר).

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; large 8vo, paper.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Maimonides' משנה תורה
msItem.note: v. 2 (the first legible words) to 9 (לקבוע על החשבון).

physDesc.p: Span. Rabb. char.; large 8vo, paper, injured and much obliterated.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: [סדר תנאים ואמוראים]
msItem.note: beg. כל היכא דאיכא איתמר, ending רב חגא ורב סמנונא סבוראין.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Responsa of early Geonim

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: R. Nathan's Arukh
msItem.note: from מל to מן, divided into chapters.

physDesc.p: Span. squ. char.; fol., vellum, much injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: מדרש לקח טוב of Tobiah ben Eliezer; Deuteronomy

msItem.p: (fol. 31) xvii. 12 (על המעשה, ed. Buber, p. 57) to חידתי וכתיב) 17, ed. p. 58)
(fol.32) xviii. 14 (האמורה בעניין) to xix. 3 (אשר ינחילך, ed. p. 62)

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: מדרש לקח טוב of Tobiah ben Eliezer; Deuteronomy
msItem.note: xxiii. 25, beg. injured (ed. p. 82) to xxiv. 1 end missing (ed. somewhat different).

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 34) much injured, ends אמ̇ ר̇ נתן אל ..... בכוס אהר אמר .... כשט וברותי .... אמ̇ ר̇ לוי אילו בני...

(fol. 34b) of מסכת תמורה, agreeing with the Wilna edition, ends ואין אתה יכול (ed. p. 63b). This is the beg. of the fifth chapter in the MS. After the words at the beg. שדי יענני (fol. 35) follows in the MS. a note beg. פירש הר̇ר̇ ישעיה הן תוי שדי יענני לשון סימן...

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of Midrash Thanḥuma (?)
msItem.note: composed of sections beg. ד̇א̇, on אחרי מות ; the passage in Midrash Thanḥuma (ed. Buber, Lev. p. 65) occurs, followed by (fol. 38b) ד̇א̇ בק̇ לפני ייי ז̇ה̇ש̇ה̇ מי יודע עוז ... אמ̇ ר̇ תנחומ̇ אפילו הצדיקים אינן ממתינין בשמחתן בע̇ה̇.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Halakhic fragment
msItem.note: much obliterated, on Lev. xii. 1 to 8. No striking passage for identification.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of theological treatise on Messianic matter (?)
msItem.note:
The following passage occurs (fol. 47) concerning Isaiah xi: כמו שכתו̇ בפי̇ ה̇ר̇ם̇ ב̇ן̇ ז̇ל̇ וכן נראה ממשמעות הכתובים שיהיו בעולם דכתי̇ זאב באותה ההבטחה זאב וטלה ירעו כאחד. וה̇ר̇ם̇ ב̇מ̇ ז̇ל̇ מפרש כר̇ יהודה שעולם כמנהגו הולך נוהג;
farther on it is said on Ps. xcviii. 8 כי זה הענין ג̇כ̇ משל כמו שאמרנו וכן פירשו אלו הפסוקים בן גיקטילא ובן בלעם.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 48) Masorah finalis enumerating the cases in which words are connected with על, beg. בדמות בני, followed by כל לשון נחלה .

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Masoretic fragment
msItem.note: enumerating the instances of עושֶה , מעשֶה , קרי ולא כתיב , כתיב ולא קרי.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of Seadiah Gaon's ס̇ המועדים ?
msItem.note: (see Harkavy's Studien und Mittheilungen, v. p. 220), with vowel points and accents.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: The Arabic introduction to Moses ben Ezra's ענק

physDesc.p: Syr. curs. char.; fol., paper, injured.

history.acquisition: Given by the Egypt Expl. Fund, 1890 (from the Genizah).

taxonomy.desc: General index of Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906

term.ref: Seadiah b. Joseph al-fayyumi, Gaon. ספר המועדים (?).
Moses (b. Jacob) b. Ezra. ענק. (Arabic introduction).
